00001 #!/usr/bin/env python
00002 # pygame + PyOpenGL version of Nehe's OpenGL lesson07
00003 # Paul Furber 2001 - m@verick.co.za
00004 
00005 import os
00006 from OpenGL.GL import *
00007 from OpenGL.GLU import *
00008 import pygame, pygame.image
00009 from pygame.locals import *
00010 
00011 
00012 xrot = yrot = 0.0
00013 xspeed = yspeed = 0.0
00014 z = -5.0
00015 textures = []
00016 filter = 0
00017 light = 0
00018 
00019 LightAmbient  = ( (0.5, 0.5, 0.5, 1.0) );
00020 LightDiffuse  = ( (1.0, 1.0, 1.0, 1.0) );
00021 LightPosition = ( (0.0, 0.0, 2.0, 1.0) );
00022 
00023 
00024 def resize((width, height)):
00025     if height==0:
00026         height=1
00027     glViewport(0, 0, width, height)
00028     glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION)
00029     glLoadIdentity()
00030     gluPerspective(45, 1.0*width/height, 0.1, 100.0)
00031     glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW)
00032     glLoadIdentity()
00033 
00034 def init():
00035     glEnable(GL_TEXTURE_2D)
00036     load_textures()
00037     glShadeModel(GL_SMOOTH)
00038     glClearColor(0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0)
00039     glClearDepth(1.0)
00040     glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST)
00041     glDepthFunc(GL_LEQUAL)
00042     glHint(GL_PERSPECTIVE_CORRECTION_HINT, GL_NICEST)
00043     glLightfv( GL_LIGHT1, GL_AMBIENT, LightAmbient )
00044     glLightfv( GL_LIGHT1, GL_DIFFUSE, LightDiffuse )
00045     glLightfv( GL_LIGHT1, GL_POSITION, LightPosition )
00046     glEnable( GL_LIGHT1 )
00047 
00048 
00049 def load_textures():
00050     global LightAmbient, LightDiffuse, LightPosition, textures
00051     
00052     texturefile = os.path.join('data','crate.bmp')
00053     textureSurface = pygame.image.load(texturefile)
00054     textureData = pygame.image.tostring(textureSurface, "RGBX", 1)
00055 
00056     textures = glGenTextures(3)
00057     
00058     glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, textures[0])
00059     glTexImage2D( GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, GL_RGBA, textureSurface.get_width(), textureSurface.get_height(), 0,
00060                   GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, textureData )
00061     glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_NEAREST)
00062     glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_NEAREST)
00063 
00064     glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, textures[1])
00065     glTexParameteri( GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_LINEAR )
00066     glTexParameteri( GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_LINEAR )
00067     glTexImage2D( GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, GL_RGBA, textureSurface.get_width(), textureSurface.get_height(), 0,
00068                   GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, textureData )
00069 
00070     glBindTexture( GL_TEXTURE_2D, textures[2])
00071     glTexParameteri( GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_LINEAR_MIPMAP_NEAREST )
00072     glTexParameteri( GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_LINEAR )
00073     gluBuild2DMipmaps( GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_RGBA, textureSurface.get_width(), textureSurface.get_height(),
00074                        GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, textureData);
00075 
00076 
00077 
00078 def draw():
00079     global xrot, yrot, xspeed, yspeed, z, filter
00080     
00081     glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT)
00082     glLoadIdentity()
00083     glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, z)
00084 
00085     glRotatef(xrot, 1.0, 0.0, 0.0)
00086     glRotatef(yrot, 0.0, 1.0, 0.0)
00087 
00088     glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, textures[filter])
00089     
00090     glBegin(GL_QUADS)
00091         
00092     glNormal3f(0.0, 0.0, 1.0)
00093     glTexCoord2f(0.0, 0.0); glVertex3f(-1.0, -1.0,  1.0)        # Bottom Left Of The Texture and Quad
00094     glTexCoord2f(1.0, 0.0); glVertex3f( 1.0, -1.0,  1.0)        # Bottom Right Of The Texture and Quad
00095     glTexCoord2f(1.0, 1.0); glVertex3f( 1.0,  1.0,  1.0)        # Top Right Of The Texture and Quad
00096     glTexCoord2f(0.0, 1.0); glVertex3f(-1.0,  1.0,  1.0)        # Top Left Of The Texture and Quad
00097         
00098     # Back Face
00099     glNormal3f(0.0, 0.0, -1.0)
00100     glTexCoord2f(0.0, 0.0); glVertex3f(-1.0, -1.0, -1.0)        # Bottom Right Of The Texture and Quad
00101     glTexCoord2f(0.0, 1.0); glVertex3f(-1.0,  1.0, -1.0)        # Top Right Of The Texture and Quad
00102     glTexCoord2f(1.0, 1.0); glVertex3f( 1.0,  1.0, -1.0)        # Top Left Of The Texture and Quad
00103     glTexCoord2f(1.0, 0.0); glVertex3f( 1.0, -1.0, -1.0)        # Bottom Left Of The Texture and Quad
00104         
00105     # Top Face
00106     glNormal3f(0.0, 1.0, 0.0)
00107     glTexCoord2f(1.0, 1.0); glVertex3f(-1.0,  1.0, -1.0)        # Top Left Of The Texture and Quad
00108     glTexCoord2f(1.0, 0.0); glVertex3f(-1.0,  1.0,  1.0)        # Bottom Left Of The Texture and Quad
00109     glTexCoord2f(0.0, 0.0); glVertex3f( 1.0,  1.0,  1.0)        # Bottom Right Of The Texture and Quad
00110     glTexCoord2f(0.0, 1.0); glVertex3f( 1.0,  1.0, -1.0)        # Top Right Of The Texture and Quad
00111         
00112     # Bottom Face
00113     glNormal3f(0.0, -1.0, 0.0)
00114     glTexCoord2f(0.0, 1.0); glVertex3f(-1.0, -1.0, -1.0)        # Top Right Of The Texture and Quad
00115     glTexCoord2f(1.0, 1.0); glVertex3f( 1.0, -1.0, -1.0)        # Top Left Of The Texture and Quad
00116     glTexCoord2f(1.0, 0.0); glVertex3f( 1.0, -1.0,  1.0)        # Bottom Left Of The Texture and Quad
00117     glTexCoord2f(0.0, 0.0); glVertex3f(-1.0, -1.0,  1.0)        # Bottom Right Of The Texture and Quad
00118         
00119     # Right face
00120     glNormal3f(1.0, 0.0, 0.0)
00121     glTexCoord2f(0.0, 0.0); glVertex3f( 1.0, -1.0, -1.0)        # Bottom Right Of The Texture and Quad
00122     glTexCoord2f(0.0, 1.0); glVertex3f( 1.0,  1.0, -1.0)        # Top Right Of The Texture and Quad
00123     glTexCoord2f(1.0, 1.0); glVertex3f( 1.0,  1.0,  1.0)        # Top Left Of The Texture and Quad
00124     glTexCoord2f(1.0, 0.0); glVertex3f( 1.0, -1.0,  1.0)        # Bottom Left Of The Texture and Quad
00125         
00126     # Left Face
00127     glNormal3f(-1.0, 0.0, 0.0)
00128     glTexCoord2f(1.0, 0.0); glVertex3f(-1.0, -1.0, -1.0)        # Bottom Left Of The Texture and Quad
00129     glTexCoord2f(0.0, 0.0); glVertex3f(-1.0, -1.0,  1.0)        # Bottom Right Of The Texture and Quad
00130     glTexCoord2f(0.0, 1.0); glVertex3f(-1.0,  1.0,  1.0)        # Top Right Of The Texture and Quad
00131     glTexCoord2f(1.0, 1.0); glVertex3f(-1.0,  1.0, -1.0)        # Top Left Of The Texture and Quad
00132         
00133     glEnd();                            
00134     
00135     xrot += xspeed
00136     yrot += yspeed
00137 
00138 def handle_keys(key):
00139     global filter, light, z, xspeed, yspeed
00140 
00141     if key == K_ESCAPE:
00142         return 0
00143     if key == K_f:
00144         filter = filter + 1
00145         if filter == 3:
00146             filter = 0
00147     elif key == K_l:
00148         light = not light
00149         if not light:
00150             glDisable(GL_LIGHTING)
00151         else:
00152             glEnable(GL_LIGHTING)
00153     elif key == K_PAGEUP:
00154         z -= 0.05
00155     elif key == K_PAGEDOWN:
00156         z += 0.05
00157     elif key == K_UP:
00158         xspeed -= 0.01
00159     elif key == K_DOWN:
00160         xspeed += 0.01
00161     elif key == K_LEFT:
00162         yspeed -= 0.01
00163     elif key == K_RIGHT:
00164         yspeed += 0.01
00165     
00166     return 1
00167 
00168 def main():
00169 
00170     video_flags = OPENGL|DOUBLEBUF
00171     
00172     pygame.init()
00173     surface = pygame.display.set_mode((640,480), video_flags)
00174 
00175     resize((640,480))
00176     init()
00177 
00178     frames = 0
00179     ticks = pygame.time.get_ticks()
00180     while 1:
00181         event = pygame.event.poll()
00182         if event.type == QUIT:
00183             break
00184         if event.type == KEYDOWN:
00185             if handle_keys(event.key) == 0:
00186                 break
00187         
00188         draw()
00189         pygame.display.flip()
00190         frames = frames+1
00191 
00192     print "fps:  %d" % ((frames*1000)/(pygame.time.get_ticks()-ticks))
00193 
00194 
00195 if __name__ == '__main__': main()
